title: [Gyldemar Forest, Cobbled Path]
description: Tangled beards of dark green moss hang heavily from gnarled limbs, tiny forest beetles crawling within their hair-like strands.  Tall oaks shelter the ancient path from the light of the sun, blanketing the wild undergrowth in cool shadow.  A muffled chittering, similar to the jeering cry of restless squirrels, echoes through the woods.

Tangled beards of dark moss hang heavily from gnarled limbs, tiny forest beetles crawling within their hair-like strands.  Tall oaks shelter the ancient path from the pale moonlight, blanketing the wild undergrowth in cool shadow.  A muffled chittering, similar to the jeering cry of restless squirrels, echoes through the woods.
